title: Multi-agent personal assistant orchestration with GPT-4o & WhatsApp
description:
## Description  

'Elena AI' is a powerful n8n workflow that transforms your automation platform into a full-fledged, multi-agent AI hub. ü§ñ‚ú® By combining Redis state management with specialized ‚Äútool‚Äù sub-workflows, you can build contextual, scalable, and highly personalized conversational automations for WhatsApp, Telegram, email, and more.

## üî• Key Features  
- **Unified Ingestion** üì•  
  ‚Ä¢ Webhook trigger for text, audio, image, or document messages  
  ‚Ä¢ Automatic extraction of `remoteJid`, user ID, and payload metadata  
- **Stateful Context** üîÑ  
  ‚Ä¢ Redis push/get queue to preserve conversation history  
  ‚Ä¢ Seamless handling of follow-ups and multi-turn dialogs  
- **Dynamic Routing** üîÄ  
  ‚Ä¢ Smart Switch logic directs messages to the right agent workflow  
  ‚Ä¢ Agents available:  
    - üóìÔ∏è **Malu**: Google Calendar scheduling & reminders  
    - üí∞ **Maria**: Expense logging & budget tracking in Baserow  
    - üë• **Mafalda**: Contact CRUD operations in Baserow  
    - üì∏ **Marcela**: Audio transcription & image analysis  
    - ‚úâÔ∏è **Martina**: Gmail send/receive & template replies  
- **Bite-Sized Responses** ‚úÇÔ∏è  
  ‚Ä¢ Splits long AI replies into line-by-line messages  
  ‚Ä¢ Loop node controls rate & order for best UX  
- **Flexible Output** üì§  
  ‚Ä¢ HTTP Request node to deliver text, media, or files  
  ‚Ä¢ Customize headers, payloads, and endpoints  

## üéØ Use Cases  
- AI-powered customer support bots  
- Automated lead qualification & follow-up  
- Intelligent scheduling & reminders  
- Expense approval workflows  
- Multimedia content analysis & response  

## üìã Requirements  
- **n8n ‚â• 1.0** with **Webhook**, **Redis**, **SplitInBatches**, **HTTP Request** & **Workflow** nodes  
- **Redis** server (connection credentials in n8n)  
- Service accounts / API keys for:  
  - Google Calendar (OAuth2)  
  - Baserow (API token)  
  - Gmail (OAuth2)  
  - Messaging API endpoint (HTTP)  
- Environment variables set in n8n:  
  - `REDIS_HOST`, `REDIS_PORT`, `REDIS_PASSWORD`  
  - `GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID`, `GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET`  
  - `BASEROW_API_TOKEN`  
  - `GMAIL_CLIENT_ID`, `GMAIL_CLIENT_SECRET`  
  - `MSG_API_URL`, `MSG_API_KEY`  

## üöÄ Quick Start  
1. **Import** the `ElenaAI.json` into n8n.  
2. **Configure** credentials and environment variables under **Settings ‚Üí Credentials**.  
3. **Link** sub-workflows (Malu, Maria, Mafalda, Marcela, Martina) by updating their Workflow IDs in the main node.  
4. **Test** via Execute node or send a sample webhook payload.  
5. **Deploy** by exposing the Webhook endpoint to your messaging platform.  

Unlock seamless, AI-driven conversations across any channel‚Äîget MavenBot 2.0 running in minutes! üöÄ
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.

overview.description:
## Description  

'Elena AI' is a powerful n8n workflow that transforms your automation platform into a full-fledged, multi-agent AI hub. ü§ñ‚ú® By combining Redis state management with specialized ‚Äútool‚Äù sub-workflows, you can build contextual, scalable, and highly personalized conversational automations for WhatsApp, Telegram, email, and more.

## üî• Key Features  
- **Unified Ingestion** üì•  
  ‚Ä¢ Webhook trigger for text, audio, image, or document messages  
  ‚Ä¢ Automatic extraction of `remoteJid`, user ID, and payload metadata  
- **Stateful Context** üîÑ  
  ‚Ä¢ Redis push/get queue to preserve conversation history  
  ‚Ä¢ Seamless handling of follow-ups and multi-turn dialogs  
- **Dynamic Routing** üîÄ  
  ‚Ä¢ Smart Switch logic directs messages to the right agent workflow  
  ‚Ä¢ Agents available:  
    - üóìÔ∏è **Malu**: Google Calendar scheduling & reminders  
    - üí∞ **Maria**: Expense logging & budget tracking in Baserow  
    - üë• **Mafalda**: Contact CRUD operations in Baserow  
    - üì∏ **Marcela**: Audio transcription & image analysis  
    - ‚úâÔ∏è **Martina**: Gmail send/receive & template replies  
- **Bite-Sized Responses** ‚úÇÔ∏è  
  ‚Ä¢ Splits long AI replies into line-by-line messages  
  ‚Ä¢ Loop node controls rate & order for best UX  
- **Flexible Output** üì§  
  ‚Ä¢ HTTP Request node to deliver text, media, or files  
  ‚Ä¢ Customize headers, payloads, and endpoints  

## üéØ Use Cases  
- AI-powered customer support bots  
- Automated lead qualification & follow-up  
- Intelligent scheduling & reminders  
- Expense approval workflows  
- Multimedia content analysis & response  

## üìã Requirements  
- **n8n ‚â• 1.0** with **Webhook**, **Redis**, **SplitInBatches**, **HTTP Request** & **Workflow** nodes  
- **Redis** server (connection credentials in n8n)  
- Service accounts / API keys for:  
  - Google Calendar (OAuth2)  
  - Baserow (API token)  
  - Gmail (OAuth2)  
  - Messaging API endpoint (HTTP)  
- Environment variables set in n8n:  
  - `REDIS_HOST`, `REDIS_PORT`, `REDIS_PASSWORD`  
  - `GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID`, `GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET`  
  - `BASEROW_API_TOKEN`  
  - `GMAIL_CLIENT_ID`, `GMAIL_CLIENT_SECRET`  
  - `MSG_API_URL`, `MSG_API_KEY`  

## üöÄ Quick Start  
1. **Import** the `ElenaAI.json` into n8n.  
2. **Configure** credentials and environment variables under **Settings ‚Üí Credentials**.  
3. **Link** sub-workflows (Malu, Maria, Mafalda, Marcela, Martina) by updating their Workflow IDs in the main node.  
4. **Test** via Execute node or send a sample webhook payload.  
5. **Deploy** by exposing the Webhook endpoint to your messaging platform.  

Unlock seamless, AI-driven conversations across any channel‚Äîget MavenBot 2.0 running in minutes! üöÄ
